name: Penguin Swing
description:
This game was made for a school challenge: build a single button game in 3 hours. It is a simple physics high score game made with Unity. The goal is to launch the penguins as far as possible.

Controls

The game can be played with any button. Hold down any button to push the penguins. You can do this exactly 6 times. The last time the penguin will launch from the swing as soon as you release the button. 

To make the penguin go even further you can hit any button right before the penguin lands to make it bounce even higher!
